channel.title: CVE Feed for Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-33633|2024-04-29T05:06:17.270Z -- Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Piotnet Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro: from n/a through 7.1.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-33632|2024-04-29T05:58:58.224Z -- Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Piotnet Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro.This issue affects Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro: from n/a through 7.1.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-33635|2024-04-29T08:23:22.260Z -- Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Piotnet Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro.This issue affects Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro: from n/a through 7.1.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-33634|2024-04-29T07:44:51.425Z -- Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Piotnet Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro.This issue affects Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro: from n/a through 7.1.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-33631|2024-04-29T05:07:56.202Z -- Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Piotnet Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Piotnet Addons For Elementor Pro: from n/a through 7.1.17.
